actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.
Committee on Armed Services. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 694 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for construction at certain military installations for fiscal year 1981, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Supplemental Military Construction Authorization Act, l981 - Authorizes supplemental appropriations for construction at specified military installations of the Army, Marine Corps, Air Training Command, and Strategic Air Command. Authorizes the Secretaries of Defense and the Air Force to accomplish specified minor construction projects. Authorizes supplemental appropriations for the support of military family housing. Permits the Secretary of Defense to establish or develop facilities for the Air National Guard. Subjects the authorizations made by this Act to the limitations of the Military Construction Authorization Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for construction at certain military installations for fiscal year 1981, and for other purposes.
